channel.title: Posts on RadiantCuriosity
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on RadiantCuriosity

item.title: Introduction to RadiantCuriosity
item.description:
Hello, welcome to RadiantCuriosity, a conglomeration of interesting and interconnected turorials and writings on understanding and utilizing artificial intelligence.

We aim to be succinct, informationally dense, and actionable.

item.title: Mathematical Symbols and Operations
item.description:
\begin{table}[ht] \renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.3} \centering \textbf{Mathematical Symbols and Operations} \label{tab:math_symbols} \begin{tabular}{llll} \toprule \textbf{Category} & \textbf{Symbol} & \textbf{Example} & \textbf{LaTeX} \\ \midrule

\multicolumn{4}{l}{\textbf{Greek Letters}} \\ \midrule Alpha & $\alpha$ & $\alpha + \beta = \gamma$ & \verb|\alpha| \\ Beta & $\beta$ & $f(\beta) = \beta^2$ & \verb|\beta| \\ Gamma & $\gamma$ & $\Gamma(n) = (n-1)!$ & \verb|\gamma| \\ Sigma & $\Sigma$ & $\Sigma_{i=1}^n i = \frac{n(n+1)}{2}$ & \verb|\Sigma| \\ Pi & $\Pi$ & $\Pi_{i=1}^n i = n!$ & \verb|\Pi| \\ Delta & $\Delta$ & $\Delta x$ — change in $x$ & \verb|\Delta| \\ Theta & $\theta$ & $\theta = \arctan\left(\frac{y}{x}\right)$ & \verb|\theta| \\ Lambda & $\lambda$ & $E = \lambda h \nu$ & \verb|\lambda| \\ Mu & $\mu$ & $\mu$ — the mean & \verb|\mu| \\ \midrule
